Text:
function ERU_EP04_08()
    -- .承-2【11月第2週】「アルメリアとデート」
    SaveData.Title = "アルメリアとデート"

    -- //BG：駅前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

    MSG([[ Waiting at the nearest station to Yuriai Private Academy, Arumeria-san arrived right on time. ]])

    -- //BU：アルメリア（通常・私服）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "...Sorry to keep you waiting, Mina-chan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You're Hermes-san, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "...I'm Arumeria right now, okay? Hermes got up early to watch her morning anime and is sound asleep now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, no! That's not what I meant—the way you're dressed..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah, that's what you meant. See, we're idols after all." ]])

    MSG([[ She switched from her usual cute, frilly fashion. ]])

    MSG([[ Wearing baggy tops and bottoms paired with men's outerwear, she was dressed in an unexpectedly mature style for a student. ]])

    MSG([[ On top of that, with her hat pulled low, sunglasses hiding her eyes, and her hair let down, she looked like a completely different person. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, her intense charm clearly caught the eyes of those around us. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone passing through the station, other than me, kept glancing at Hermes-san—or rather, Arumeria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ If we stayed stopped here for too long, her true identity might be exposed. We needed to move somewhere quickly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So, what shall we do? Is there anywhere you want to go?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Anywhere's fine if I'm with Mina-chan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2224.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-is that so..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Suddenly hearing such a kind word made my face heat up. ]])

    MSG([[ It was the first time a girl had shown me such straightforward affection, and I didn’t know how to respond. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2225.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "By the way, how did you realize I’m the same person as Minato? I haven’t told you about my cross-dressing, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "...And you ask me that?" ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria-san smiled meaningfully. Wh-what could that mean? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Well, don’t worry too much. No matter how perfect the disguise, some people just can tell." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "I won’t tell the others, so you can relax. Even Hermes seems unaware." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "You wouldn’t spill the secret that I have two personalities either, right, Mina-chan?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2226.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "O-of course not!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I felt relieved by Arumeria-san’s words. Sharing secrets like this between us made my heart race. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2227.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ve been curious, how do you usually switch between your two personalities?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hermes spends most of her time training to be an idol—working out, doing vocal exercises, she’s hardly ever quiet while awake." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fc")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Because of that, she often accidentally falls asleep. She’s still pretty immature mentally." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Meanwhile, I handle our work confirmations and prep. I usually attend meetings and then explain things to Hermes in simpler terms." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2228.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-you both sound pretty busy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Well... now’s our time to shine, so it can’t be helped. I’m sure things will calm down in a few years." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Since we’re busy, Nemesia Okaasama and Daria Onee-sama are giving us their full support. People say things behind the scenes, but their love for us is genuine." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0110.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Though, sending helicopters flying all the time might be a bit overprotective." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2229.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "N-no way it’s happening today too...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0111.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Today we’re taking the train. Don’t worry, we won’t use helicopters even for a secret date." ]])

    MSG([[ That made sense. I laughed at my ridiculous question. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0112.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hehe... Today, it’s really a day off from being an idol. I’m just going to think about this date with Mina-chan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2230.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "J-just about... me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Come on, let’s start walking. We don’t need a destination." ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria-san took my hand, flushed red, and started walking. ]])

    MSG([[ Her expression wasn’t the troubled one I had seen before but instead shone brightly. ]])

    MSG([[ Just seeing that smile made coming here worthwhile. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2231.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Then, let’s take a leisurely stroll through the shopping district first." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2232.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yakagase Shopping Street has lots of shops. Just looking around is fun." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Yakagase, huh. Yeah, it’s been a while—I’m excited." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2233.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Been here before? Arumeria-san, have you?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Well... a little. I’ll tell you about that sometime." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0116.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Come on, let’s go quickly<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> We’ve got to enjoy the whole day." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2234.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ And so, my secret date with the national idol began. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：繁華街
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-500,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,500,200,30000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Along the street near Yakagase Shopping Street, a wide variety of shops lined the national highway—from eateries to antique furniture and stationery stores. ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria-san pulled my hand as we walked, taking in the scenery around us with a somewhat nostalgic voice. ]])

    MSG([[ At a certain stationery store. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah, this shop is nostalgic. They sell lots of cute stationery." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
    PLAY_VOICE("erika_2235.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Wow, everything is really cute. I might buy something for school." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hehe, this letter set with math shapes will make Hermes happy. I’ll pick some up for her." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2236.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sure sounds like something Hermes would like. But do people still use letter sets these days?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0119.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "For replying to fan letters. She can’t rest until she replies to every single one properly." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2237.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Really!? That’s amazing! She’s a model idol." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Well, she still can’t write complicated kanji... so I’m the one who actually puts it into words." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2238.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "T-thank you for the hard work." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Just spending one day with Hermes-san had worn me out from all the supporting she'd needed. ]])

    MSG([[ Since Arumeria-san and Hermes-san are literally one and the same, I can only imagine how tough it must be for her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0121.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Well... I enjoy doing things for Hermes. She means no harm, so I feel saved right along with her." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2239.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s a wonderful relationship." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ When you hear about multiple personalities, you tend to think negatively of mental illness, but Arumeria-san and Hermes-san seem to have a good relationship. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing Arumeria-san happily buying letter sets for Hermes felt like watching a caring older sister. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

    MSG([[ At a certain bookstore. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0122.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Oh. That used bookstore has their shelves outside now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2240.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yeah. I asked about it before—it seems they do that sometimes as promotion." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0123.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "It’s fun discovering things you didn’t notice before. Hermes would have loved that." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2241.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Does Hermes like books?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0124.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah, no. I just picture her hopping around, saying stuff like, ‘It’s like a grocery store for books! Amazing!’" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2242.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I can imagine that." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ We laughed imagining Hermes happily hopping about. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02na")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "I’ll sneak our photo book in here~" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2243.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "What are you doing!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> We’ve been taught never to miss any chance to promote ourselves<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2244.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Stop making that face and let’s go! We’ll get scolded!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I pulled Arumeria-san’s mischievous hand and moved away from the bookstore. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

    MSG([[ At a certain antique shop. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Hey, this antique shop... it used to be something else, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2245.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh? S-sorry... Actually, my memories of when I came to this town before are vague." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

STOP_BGM(2000)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "I see... Yeah, that’s probably for the best, Mina-chan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2246.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Arumeria-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Arumeria-san stopped in front of an old shelf outside the shop. ]])

    -- //CG：アルメリアとデート
    -- 　　（懐かしむような表情のアルメリア・背景は骨董品店）
    -- //６年前、アルメリアが過去に怪我を負った場所です。
    -- 　怪我の原因の建物は二階で、ミナトの視界に入らないため、記憶は戻りません。
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV038aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Memories are strange, aren’t they? Sometimes they give you lots of energy, sometimes they hold you back." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "I wonder how the people who sold this furniture felt. Did they want to say goodbye to those memories?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0130_2.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Or did they hope someone else would cherish these things...? ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ Arumeria-san squinted her eyes as she touched the scratches on the shelf. ]])

    MSG([[ Her expression was somewhat lonely, and I felt heartache that I couldn’t share those feelings. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2247.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Um... what kind of memories have I forgotten? Could it be connected to the earthquake six years ago?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "You know it’s related to that earthquake, huh?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2248.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yeah. But I only recently realized how vague my memories of the big earthquake are... I can’t remember what days I forgot." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2249.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If those memories are important to you... I’m sorry." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0132.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "It’s okay. Mina-chan probably had to forget that day to move forward. As for me, that day helped me move forward. That’s all it is." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "You don’t have to force yourself to remember. It’s alright." ]])

    -- //CG：アルメリアとデート
    -- （悲しそうな表情のアルメリア・背景は骨董品店）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV038ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "This shop used to sell handmade accessories." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "The shop owner was very kind and sold things to us at shockingly low prices... That day, I thought I was the happiest person in the world." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "And after that, here..." ]])

    -- //SE：鐘の音
PLAY_SE("SEb048.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ The electronic bell chimed 5 PM. Hearing it, Arumeria-san spoke as if she had just remembered. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Ah... right. Hey, Mina-chan, aren’t you hungry?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1326.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A-a little." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arumeria】
 "Then it’s a bit far, but... shall we go to the hamburger place near the station?" ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)


    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_09")
end
